name: AP_CLAIM_IF_INFO_3
description: Additional information sent to prospective payment systems (PPS) groupers/pricers.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CLINICAL_TRIAL_REGISTRY_NUM
columns.description: Identifies the clinical trial registry number.

columns.name: DISCHARGE_DATE
columns.description: For inpatient, the date the patient was discharged from the facility. For outpatient, the end date of the period covered on the claim.

columns.name: NONCOVERED_CHARGES
columns.description: The portion of the claim's total charges that is not recognized for payment.

columns.name: ADMIT_DX_USED
columns.description: The admit diagnosis code that was used during processing.

columns.name: ANALYSIS_PAYMENT
columns.description: The standard payment for the claim including applicable add-ons or adjustments, but excluding transfers and outliers.

columns.name: CAPITAL_COST_OUTLIER_PAYMENT
columns.description: Additional payment for high cost cases, allowing for reimbursement for capital expenses.

columns.name: CAPITAL_COST_OUTLIER_THRESHOLD
columns.description: Capital portion of the cost threshold.

columns.name: CAPITAL_COSTS
columns.description: Charges reduced to capital portion of costs.

columns.name: CAPITAL_DSH_FACTOR
columns.description: Calculated amount that is multiplied by the capital federal specific portion (FSP) payment to derive the capital disproportionate share hospital (DSH) payment.

columns.name: CAPITAL_EXCEPTION_PAYMENT
columns.description: A set amount per claim to reimburse for capital expenses.

columns.name: CAPITAL_FSP_PAYMENT
columns.description: Federal specific portion payment for capital, the standard prospective payment to reimburse for capital expenses.

columns.name: CAPITAL_HSP_PAYMENT
columns.description: The hospital specific portion payment for capital.

columns.name: CAPITAL_IME_FACTOR
columns.description: Calculated amount that is multiplied by the capital federal specific portion (FSP) payment to derive the capital indirect medical education (IME) payment.

columns.name: CAPITAL_OLD_HOLD_HARMLESS_PMT
columns.description: Cost payment for old capital.

columns.name: CAPITAL_PAYMENT
columns.description: The total capital payment for the claim.

columns.name: CLINICAL_TRIAL_ADDON_PAYMENT
columns.description: The add-on payment for agency approved procedure codes determined to be a part of clinical trials.

columns.name: DEVICE_AMOUNT
columns.description: The vendor credit amount for a replacement device as reported with value code FD.

columns.name: DEVICE_CREDIT_FLAG
columns.description: Indicates whether the diagnosis related group is subject to a device credit.

columns.name: DISCHARGE_STATUS_USED
columns.description: Indicates the discharge status used in grouping.

columns.name: DSH_PAYMENT
columns.description: The disproportionate share hospital payment.

columns.name: HAC_CAT_SATISFIED_COUNT
columns.description: Number of unique hospital-acquired condition categories satisfied on the claim.

columns.name: HAC_REDUCTION_PROGRAM_ADJ
columns.description: Amount the total claim payment was reduced due to the Hospital-Acquired Condition reduction program.

columns.name: HAC_STATUS
columns.description: Indicates overall results of hospital-acquired condition processing at the claim level.

columns.name: HEMOPHILIA_ADDON_PAYMENT
columns.description: Add-on payment for blood clotting factor administered to hemophilia inpatients.

columns.name: HOSP_READMIT_REDUCT_PROG_ADJ
columns.description: Adjustment to the claim payment in accordance with the hospital readmissions reduction program.

columns.name: ICD_VERSION_QUALIFIER_USED
columns.description: Indicates whether the code set used for processing was ICD-9 or ICD-10.

columns.name: INDIRECT_MEDICAL_EDU_PAYMENT
columns.description: Reimbursement for indirect medical education.

columns.name: INIT_DX_RELATED_GROUP
columns.description: The diagnosis related group (DRG) calculated before CMS Hospital-Acquired Conditions are considered.

columns.name: INIT_MAJOR_DX_CAT
columns.description: The major diagnostic category (MDC) assigned before CMS hospital-acquired conditions are considered.

columns.name: INIT_MEDICAL_SURGICAL_DRG_FLAG
columns.description: Flag indicating if the initial diagnosis related group (DRG) is medical, surgical, or neither.

columns.name: INITIAL_RETURN_CODE
columns.description: Error return code for the initial diagnosis related group assignment.

columns.name: LENGTH_OF_STAY
columns.description: The number of days the patient was hospitalized.

columns.name: LOW_VOLUME_ADDON_PAYMENT
columns.description: The portion of the total payment that is additional due to the provider qualifying as a Medicare low volume hospital.

columns.name: LOW_VOLUME_ADJ_PERCENT
columns.description: The percentage adjustment used to determine the Low Volume Add-on Payment.

columns.name: MARGINAL_COST_FACTOR
columns.description: The variable is used in the calculation of an outlier payment.

columns.name: MEDICAL_SURGICAL_DRG_FLAG
columns.description: Indicates if the Diagnosis Related Group is medical, surgical, or neither.

columns.name: NATIONAL_FSP_AMOUNT
columns.description: The operating base rate, which is multiplied by the weight to determine the Operating Federal Specific Portion payment.

columns.name: NEW_TECHNOLOGY_ADDON_PAYMENT
columns.description: Add-on payment for certain devices, which CMS approves for an additional payment.

columns.name: OPERATING_COST_OUTLIER_PAYMENT
columns.description: Extra payment for a high cost case to reimburse operating expenses.

columns.name: OPERATING_COST_OUTLIER_THRESH
columns.description: Operating portion of the cost threshold.

columns.name: OPERATING_COSTS
columns.description: Charges reduced to operating portion of costs.

columns.name: OPERATING_DSH_FACTOR
columns.description: Used to determine if the hospital qualifies for a Disproportionate Share Hospital (DSH) adjustment and the size of capital and operating DSH adjustments.

columns.name: OPERATING_FSP_PAYMENT
columns.description: The federal specific portion reimbursed for operating expenses.

columns.name: OPERATING_HSP_PAYMENT
columns.description: The hospital specific portion reimbursed for operating expenses.

columns.name: OPERATING_IME_FACTOR
columns.description: A calculated value based around the provider intern to bed ratio, which is multiplied by the relative weight to calculate the operating indirect medical education (IME) payment.

columns.name: PAYMENT_STATUS
columns.description: Payment status for the claim.

columns.name: POST_ACUTE_CARE_TRANSFER_DRG
columns.description: Indicates whether or not the DRG is subject to the post acute care transfer reimbursement policy.

columns.name: PX_USED_COUNT
columns.description: Number of procedure codes used for grouping.

columns.name: SECONDARY_DX_USED_COUNT
columns.description: Number of secondary diagnosis codes and External Cause of Injury Codes that were used during processing.

columns.name: SERVICE_LOCATION_ID_IN
columns.description: A unique identifier for the facility service location.

columns.name: SPEC_POST_ACUTE_CARE_TRANS_DRG
columns.description: Indicates whether or not the DRG is subject to the special post acute care transfer reimbursement policy.

columns.name: SUGGESTED_PRINCIPAL_PX
columns.description: The suggested principal procedure based on coding practice and policies.

columns.name: TOTAL_EXCL_PASS_THROUGH_PMT
columns.description: The total expected payment without miscellaneous per diem amounts.

columns.name: TOTAL_OPERATING_PAYMENT
columns.description: Claim reimbursement for operating expenses.

columns.name: TOTAL_PAYMENT
columns.description: The total payment for the claim.

columns.name: TRANSFER_IMPACT
columns.description: Amount calculated for transfer claims to show the change in payment caused by the transfer status.

columns.name: UNCOMPENSATED_CARE_PAYMENT
columns.description: Interim uncompensated care payment according to the Affordable Care Act for disproportionate share hospital payments.

columns.name: VBP_PROGRAM_ADJ
columns.description: Adjustment to the total payment in accordance with the Hospital Value-Based Purchasing Program.

columns.name: PROV_MEDICARE_NUM
columns.description: The Medicare number of the provider associated with the claim.

columns.name: DISCHRG_STAT_RET_CD
columns.description: Error code assigned to the discharge status mapping assignment.

columns.name: BIRTH_WEIGHT
columns.description: The birth weight, in grams.
